attributes.action: Stop Approving Petitions Relating To Football
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am sick of football related petitions being put on this site. What does the PM have to do with who England manager is? Silly petitions like this are wasting No 10's time. Football is just a game it has nothing to do with the Government

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
